General.Name: Vietnam National Seed Group JSC
General.Description: Vietnam National Seed Group Joint Stock Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, and sale of crop seeds in Vietnam. It offers crop seeds, such as rice, corn, and vegetable seeds; organic farm products, including organic rice and fresh vegetables; and agricultural materials comprising herbicide maizine, fungicide foraxyl, and foliar fertilizer supermes, as well as various agricultural services. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam. Vietnam National Seed Group Joint Stock Company is a subsidiary of The Pan Group Joint Stock Company.
